item.description:
Pot Luck and Movie Viewing - Join us for a Pot Luck meal and a viewing of Peaceable Kingdom. Please bring Vegan dishes and your recipe if possible. You are also welcome to byob.

About the movie: At a time when the public in more concerned than ever about health and environmental problems associated with large-scale factory farming, Peaceable Kingdom explores another angle to this unfolding story: the interconnected life journeys of farm animals, former farmers, and animal rescuers struggling against an out of control industrial system.

Breaking generations of silence in the farm community, Peaceable Kingdom weaves together themes of respect, forgiveness, commitment, and healing offering a vision of a more peaceful world that is within our reach.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Pot Luck and Movie Viewing
